Title: Relates to allocating revenues from the Monroe county occupancy tax to the city of Rochester
Summary: Relates to allocating revenues from the Monroe county occupancy tax to the city of Rochester to be used to fund arts and tourism programs, projects, events, activities and/or facilities in the city of Rochester.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 41 of the laws of 1971, relating to enabling the county of Monroe to impose and collect taxes on occupancy of hotel rooms in Monroe county, in relation to allocating revenues from such taxes to the city of Rochester
